title: Washer and dryer, Premium cabinetry, Breakfast bar
posting_body: We are currently offering virtual tours.
Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!
Welcome to Inwood West
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1526 Sq.
Ft.
Inwood West features remarkable amenities and stylish apartments in Woburn, MA.
Now offering furnished and unfurnished apartments, these spacious floor plans boast gas cooktops, large closets, private patios and balconies, and an in-home washer/dryer.
Select Woburn apartments at Inwood West include cathedral ceilings, maple cabinetry, and gas fireplaces.
Enjoy access to on-site amenities featuring a sparkling swimming pool, basketball court, resident lounge complete with billiards, and a fitness facility.
Near the intersection of I-95 and I-93, Inwood West is minutes from Boston, Burlington, Cambridge, and local shopping and dining.
With convenient access to the best of the Boston Metro area, Inwood West is perfectly located and well-appointed.
Schedule a tour today!
Features:

Faux hardwood flooring*, Vaulted ceilings*, Cable ready (Comcast or Verizon), Track and recessed lighting, Upgraded kitchen*, 3-speedCeiling fans*, WALK IN closets*, Refrigerator with ice maker, Washer and dryer- FULL SIZE!,

Wall to wall carpeting, Pantry*, Gas fireplaces*, NEW STAINLESS STEEL appliances*, Microwave, NEW tile back-splash*, Granite countertops*, Lofts*, Gas range*, Garbage Disposal, Self-cleaning oven, Dens*, Breakfast bar, Dishwasher, Linen Closets, Private patio or balcony (Grill on your 1st floor patio!)
*Not all amenities available for every floor plan.
Community Amenities:

Pet friendly, Controlled access, Short term leases available, Fully-enclosed loft, Deposit free with Rhino, Ceiling fan, Moving services with Move Matcher, Outdoor Lounge, Sport court, Bocce Ball Court, Tile backsplash, 24-hour package lockers, Bay windows, Spin studio, Washer and dryer, Furnished apartments available, Resident lounge, Garages, Wood plank flooring, Stainless, black, or white appliances, Den/ office, Elevator (select buildings), Premium cabinetry, Business center, Grilling area, 24-hour fitness center, Smart home package, Billiards room, Resort-style pool, Elevator building, Gas fireplace, Patio/ balcony, Build credit score with RentTrack, Resident app, Reserved parking spots, Gas stove, Granite countertops, Quartz countertops, Resident social activities, Closet built-ins, Clubhouse, Dog park, PlayGround
